name: Drive.RS: Open World Racing
description:
Welcome to the Drive.RS public beta!

A huge open world driving game with console quality graphics and physics. This is a game for real car enthusiasts - get behind the wheel of your favourite supercar or JDM drift machine and take part in a unique and thrilling experience like never seen before on mobile.

We love racing games and you can feel that passion throughout the game. Exciting physics engineered by us to give an incredible sense of speed and capture the true essence of driving - race along highways at high speed, drift along mountain passes with your rear wheels teetering over the edge, tear through fields full of sheep feeling every bump in the terrain. Stop at your favourite beauty spot to watch the sun set after a hard night's drifting on the gruelling touge mountains. Take daredevil jumps or test your skills in the drift playgrounds.

It's your world to explore, with true freedom behind the wheel of your car.


* Explore an absolutely huge 64km2 map with 256km of roads to drive!

* Races, drift zones, and free roam gameplay

* Upgrade system - comprehensive and detailed upgrade system, with a large variety of upgrades allowing you to completely change the performance and handling of your car

* AI traffic to bring the world to life, with realistic physics and auto overtaking behaviour

* Day to night cycle

* Asphalt, dirt roads, highway, and touge style mountain roads for a real world driving experience

* Stunning landscapes and vistas, with huge mountains, rolling hills, and a beautiful rugged coastal area

* A variety of animals to encounter on your journey

* Cutting edge visuals with high end lighting and shadows, realtime reflections, and highly realistic trees and vegetation

* Console standard car physics engineered from scratch, geared towards a fun but realistic simcade experience. It's designed to bring the feel and experience of real driving to mobile games

* True to life advanced drift dynamics with realistic inertia and friction. Engineered to simulate real drift physics, requiring careful countersteering and throttle control. Requires skill,
but it's a detailed and convincing physics model that's very rewarding and fun once you learn

* Runs at 60fps on recent flagship devices

* Controller support

* Livery system coming soon

* Multiplayer coming soon

* More maps and off map drift tracks coming soon
